table_caption: Results for DKI ((A) MK, (B) AK, and (C) RK).
table_foot: Only significant clusters with large effect size (g > 0.61) are presented. Comprehensive results, including medium and lower effect sizes, can be found in Supplementary Tables S5–S7. Vol (%): Percentage of the cluster’s volume within the respective white matter area, <t>: Mean t value within the cluster; gmax: Maximum g value within the cluster.
